conbody.p: To successfully perform the task of subtracting numbers, you must know what subtraction is. “Subtraction is a mathematical operation; it is a process or action that you do with numbers. Subtraction allows you to find the difference of 2 numbers. You use the minus (-) button to express the subtraction operation in the app. In the subtraction process, we take a number and reduce it to a smaller number. That is, we take away one number from another”.
